website_summaries.verdict: Fast-absorbing almond oil that’s perfect for hydrating and smoothing the skin.
pros: Contains 50% almond oil, as well as camelina oil
Melts into the skin without leaving behind a greasy residue
Can firm, smooth, and moisturize the skin
Can lock in moisture for up to 48 hours
Doesn’t contain any parabens or phthalates
cons: A pricey body oil, and some users don’t find it effective for very dry skin

customer_reviews.title: It's so good I almost don't want to use it
customer_reviews.text: OMG, prepare for the softest skin ever! It's so good I almost don't want to use it! Why am I like this? A little goes a long way. Layer over the amande cleansing oil and Laura Mercier's almond coconut souffle and feel like a gourmand goddess all day. I began waking up early to shower in the morning instead of the evening just because I can't wait to use these products!
customer_reviews.author: magpie

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: Overall the best skin oil I have ever had the chance to use. It smells wonderful and a little goes a long way. I have honestly been using this for years but off and on, the price is what turns me off but I cannot stay away from the stuff this is my second purchase this year for my extremely dry skin. Wish it was bigger for the price.
customer_reviews.author: NYChic

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative to a moisturizing cream
customer_reviews.text: I’m very happy with this product. I have tried different oils as moisturizers, since I can’t stand creams and I’m not patience enough to wait for them to dry on a daily basis. Most oils smell different at the end of the day. This one smells great all day long, even after working out. The texture is great, not too light or too dense. It’s also very easy to apply and keeps my skin moisturized. I live in a very dry climate, this product relieves the skin itchiness and keeps it smooth
customer_reviews.author: LBS

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but...
customer_reviews.text: I really love he L'occitane brand. I have purchased several products from them. This oil goes beautifully on my skin and it does not have the "oily" feel, like some of the other beauty products have. Given that it was supposedly made with "almonds", made me feel comfortable to buy it online. Had I been be able to go to the store, I probably would not have spent the $50. It doesn't smell anything like almonds, I think it smells very artificial. It is so artificially smelling, that I thought I put one of my cleaning products on my skin. Almost the same sent. It does feel wonderful and skin, but it's not for me.
customer_reviews.author: S. Becker

customer_reviews.title: Definitely splurge on this
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry and flakey skin and my skin LOVES this stuff. It is one product I splurge on and buy over and over again. The sent is a present almond smell with no chocolaty smells like palmers oil. It is light and absorbes quickly into my skin. I use it before i get out of the shower and the bottle can be sort of awkward to hold when it becomes slippery and wet but I can handle that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almond Oil Is The Best!!
customer_reviews.text: Repeat Purchase of this almond oil. I love how it feels on my hands when I use it at night before bed. A little goes a long way and the pump sprayer doesn't get clogged or jammed over time. It has a pleasant almond scent and absorbs into the skin w/o a greasy residue on your hands. Less is most effective against dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B.

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous scented moisturizing oil.
customer_reviews.text: This is an essential product to have. Once you’ve tried it, you will never want to be without it. This luxurious moisturizing oil soaks in quickly and even with everyday use, lasts me a long time. My favorite thing is the smell. It is not perfumey or overpowering but is exquisite. I’ve tried other products in this scent by L’Occitane and while they’re all great, the best in my opinion is this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best body oil for pre/post pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: I started using this product when I got pregnant with my first child. It seemed to work with minimizing stretch marks and it smells amazing! I kept using it post baby because I loved the smell so much and it kept my skin soft. It's now my go to skincare product.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smell.
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and the quick absorption. Has not stained any cloths. Its a little on the pricey side as I use it after a daily shower and seem to be going through it rather quick. The bottle its a spray nozzle is plastic and gets stuck a some times. I would like to see this in a manual pump for easier application. Over all I like the product but will have to find something that is not going to run out in less then a month at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Not 100% sure if it can be categorized as a L'Occitane product
customer_reviews.text: i've ordered this product from L'Occitane many times. When they were out of stock i was happy to find it on Amazon. when i received it, it was a darker in color (normally it's clear). in addition, the top was clear, whereas when purchased from L'Occitane it was silver. Even the label was slightly different. The scent and the almond oil felt the same as the original purchased at L'Occitane. Now I'm wondering if this product is legitimately L'Occitane as advertised. I wouldn't buy this on Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Angelo Juarez

customer_reviews.title: Still love the name but broke out
customer_reviews.text: Im a lover of L'Occitane products but after showering and applying this to my legs I broke out in the most severe allergic reaction ever. Had welts for a couple days. I didn't want to give this product a poor rating because overall I have super sensitive skin. Hoping for others they do not have the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Kate P.

customer_reviews.title: Addicted
customer_reviews.text: This product is so amazing!!! My skin gets so dry and this has been the best thing ever! Its keeps me from looking dry and has a great scent. Only downside is its pricey and it's a glass bottle so I'm always afraid when I use it and my hands are oily that it will slip out of my hands and break.
customer_reviews.author: Momof3boys

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell. Keeps my dry skin, nice and soft. I start to panic a little when the bottle is almost empty. This is one product, that I always have to have on hand. I even use it for my face in the winter. The only reason that I didn't give 5 stars, is that the nozzle on the spray bottle, doesn't have a uniform spray. The product itself, is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen's A. Reading

customer_reviews.title: You will be so soft and smell so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite skin care product. Bar none. You apply it right after the shower when you're still damp. It soaks right in and doesn't leave you greasy. Some other reviewers have said that they didn't like the smell, but I LOVE it. That's one of the biggest draws for me. You smell absolutely amazing all day! It smells almond-y and clean at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Smell and moisturizing on skin
customer_reviews.text: Clean, fresh scent. Just strong enough but not to much. Feminine and sexy.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Aaaaaauugh
customer_reviews.text: Favorite use/ {yes original perfect product} Bedtime spray & Massage feet &hands, Heavenly Apple-What a Great ritual! Perfect for hair oil too! Enjoy
customer_reviews.author: S Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Great product although a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product, I have used this after showers to help with dry skin. Particularly in the Winter time there are days I was EXTREMELY itchy, this has helped decrease the amount of days i've experienced itchiness
customer_reviews.author: Penelope0108

customer_reviews.title: Got rid of my stubborn PK on my arms!
customer_reviews.text: I have had patches of Pilaris Keratosis on my upper arms for YEARS and after using this daily following my evening shower for about 3 months it is completely gone. I was not at all expecting that! I just LOVE this stuff. It has a really nice earthy smell that is not at all overpowering and just melts into my skin, leaving it feeling smooth and hydrated. For someone who suffers from dry skin, this stuff is life saver.
customer_reviews.author: MRH2010

customer_reviews.title: Smells and feels great!
customer_reviews.text: Love this oil, was recommended by my sister in law for pregnancy and preventing stretch marks. It smells and feels great, seems to be doing the job so far and definitely helps prevent and soothe an itchy growing baby bump.
customer_reviews.author: Dixie_01

customer_reviews.title: Aroma is wonderful
customer_reviews.text: This is the best oil moisturizer we have ever found. The fragrance is wonderful. Oil has soaked into skin faster than any lotion. Since they improved the pump sprayer it is really nice
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FAVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this body oil. The almond scent is amazing and the oil absorbes great. Very pricey....so I use sparingly!
customer_reviews.author: DLB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it smells wonderful. I use it with the shower oil and it leaves my skin nicely moisturized. Great product
customer_reviews.author: A. Gunter

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this oil! It makes my skin super soft! It smells amazing. I always get compliments on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Francesca

customer_reviews.title: it does Beautifying!!!
customer_reviews.text: you will make this product part of your bath routine!! I bet you will!. it is all what it says truly!
customer_reviews.author: Leticia Solis Zamora

customer_reviews.title: Smells like a Diaper!
customer_reviews.text: This smells exactly like a diaper. Not a dirty diaper lol but a diaper.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: The best and only body oil i use
customer_reviews.text: The smell is just divine without being too overpowering. I've been searching for the perfect almond oil and finally found this one from Loccitane. It is pricey but you just cant compare this to a $10 almond oil because you wont get the same scent and texture from the cheaper brand. I've tried cheaper version from other brand but ended up not using them because the other brand had no almond smell whatsoever so i decided to buy another bottle of Loccitane again. Its luxury in a bottle and if you can afford it, why not.
customer_reviews.author: Monomalist

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizing oil that lasts all day
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It leaves my skin very soft and moisturized. The almond fragrance isn't offensive to the nose, which is an added bonus. I have been using this product for a few years now. It's my go to product.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite things ever. The smell is amazing and subtle. It makes your skin so soft. I received a trial size as a gift and I had to buy the full size even though it was more than I normally spend on bath products.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry feet
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this product. It really helps with dry feet in the shower pre-moisturizing with lotion post shower. Great in the winter time for any dry patches.
customer_reviews.author: Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: i m giving 5 stars for texture and smell! I dont know yet if that oil will really help to avoid stretch marks during pregnancy, so I will make an update in 9 months😃
customer_reviews.author: aerico

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Really nice product, true to price for if you purchased it from Sephora or another store. Smells great, not oily. It's my go to for after a shower.
customer_reviews.author: AB123

customer_reviews.title: Fresh & airy scented
customer_reviews.text: Smells fresh, clean, light and airy.... if that makes sense. Skin instantly felt softer immediately after application without feeling greasy. Definitely most expensive oil I've ever purchased, however...I would buy it again. Hoping it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa O'Leary

customer_reviews.title: Silky!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! Spray it on after a shower and/or shave - especially if you have a little bit of a tan going - your skin will look all glowy and healthy. It also makes my skin feel smooth days after shaving. It's not that it affects the hair growth, I think it just softens the stubble as well as the skin. Anyway, it's awesome!
customer_reviews.author: K. Johnson, II

customer_reviews.title: Gift Mom LOVED!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother for Christmas and she absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nugget

customer_reviews.title: Best for pregnancy
customer_reviews.text: Love the moisture and light feeling of this product. Had terrible itching and stretching with first pregnancy, and I attribute the better skin conditions to this product. Highly recommend. Its a little bit of a splurge, but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Megann Helton-Rieter

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing too.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my belly with my first pregnancy and no stretchmarks! Using it again now on my second and 8 months in, no stretchmarks! Smells amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Leiva

customer_reviews.title: Soft skin, unbearable scent
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin so soft, I have dry skin and use it on my face. The scent is a bit too powerful for me though. Edit:: the scent was actually overwhelming and started making me nauseous. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: brittany mcpeak

customer_reviews.title: Non grease at all
customer_reviews.text: I love love love the scent. If you like almonds and vanilla you will absolutely love this product.. non grease at all and absorb very quickly. Also the scent is subtle it’s just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nakir R.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is pricey and i had a hard time pulling the trigger to purchase. I had a sample that i l i liked so finally saved up to purchase this. It has a wonderful smell. using on knees to soften the harden skin. light on the skin- not a heavy feel.
customer_reviews.author: RMW

customer_reviews.title: ... and I agree that this is what heaven smells like. Spray bottle dispenses a small amount at a ...
customer_reviews.text: My son and I agree that this is what heaven smells like. Spray bottle dispenses a small amount at a time. That is good because you only need a little bit sometimes. Softens skin and the smell is irresistible!

customer_reviews.title: Get it on

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and feels great on. It’s not cheap but definitely a nice splurge.

customer_reviews.title: I love this oil
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil. But the spray top can make it difficult to apply. Also it isnt very much product for the 50 dollar price tag. It smells really good. But It just isn't very much product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer, love the smell
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. The smell is surprisingly youthful - citrusy and almond. Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen F. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this oil. The scent is light and lingering and the oil is silky smooth. You won't regret buying this little bit of indulgence!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Frank

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and have used it for a few years. The smell is amazing and I love the way my skin feels using it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M

customer_reviews.title: Way to expense for product
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive body oil, and didn't feel it was any better than Johnson's Baby Oil. Would not repurchase.

customer_reviews.title: Silky and Soothing Almond Oil by L'Occitane
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic L'Occitane product as always, delicious scent. Makes my skin super silky.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Love this smell, my husband sniffs me all day long 😍

customer_reviews.title: Great on dry skin.
customer_reviews.text: I have cellulitis on my legs and this stuff helps with dry skin. Smells fantastic too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff LaLiberte

customer_reviews.title: soft
customer_reviews.text: Every time I get out of the shower, I get really upset because my skin is so dry, and since I use it, I find my skin is getting better and it's a little expensive, but I need it
customer_reviews.author: JOHN L GRILLO

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for your skin.. especially to disappear the stretch marks.
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended to my wife by her colleague who had twin babies and does not have a sign of any stretch marks after the delivery. My wife has been applying this since 3 months and she is already 7 now and she doesnt see any marks in her tummy and feels good about it. Also we both love the awesome smell this oil produces :) Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Vignesh Pandi

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: I love this, the smell is amazing and it makes your skin so soft!
customer_reviews.author: EricaBlair

customer_reviews.title: So soft and supple! Saving up for more soon ...
customer_reviews.text: So soft and supple ! Saving up for more soon. Light scent and it stays with you all day, so very many compliments!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It moistens my skin w/o it feeling greasy. The shine lasts all day.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as expected and the same as if you bought ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as expected and the same as if you bought it from a Loccitaine retail store. One of my all-time favorites for dry skin. Put it on as soon as you turn the shower off, while your skin is still wet. I have VERY dry skin and for the winter, this is my #1 go-to.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing but it is a little pricey. Smells and feels amazing.

customer_reviews.text: I love this oil! Simply rub it all over my face and neck and feel hydrated and ready to go. The lovey scent of almonds is enticing. Definitely will reorder from this supplier.

customer_reviews.title: It does not leave any grease marks on clothes and absorbs nicely. If you only open the bottle an smell ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this product on my legs and belly since I became pregnant an it has kept my skin well moisturized. It does not leave any grease marks on clothes and absorbs nicely. If you only open the bottle an smell it, it is strong, but it's much more delicate when sprayed evenly over skin.

customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years and nothing but fantastic results! The smell is just amazing!

customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! Very rich oil that feels great. I wish it came in a larger size & i would prefer it in a non-spray.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works pretty much as advertised - spray on, rub in and in a few minutes, you have softer, more supple skin without an oily or greasy feel. Only thing is that I'm not crazy about the fragrance...although not unpleasant or overpowering, it is stronger than I like - the good news is that it dissipates reasonably quickly. Otherwise, this is a great product from L'Occitane that's worth a try if you don't mind the somewhat strong fragrance when you first put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Executive

customer_reviews.title: smells great! Highly recommend it
customer_reviews.text: Superb!!! Makes your skin silky smooth... smells great! Highly recommend it!!!

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, non-greasy and makes skin so soft
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, non-greasy and makes skin so soft. I use it as a treat on my expanding belly right before bed. I'm hoping it helps my skin stretch to accommodate twins! Edit review: Mar. 4, 2015. I bought this because a blogger I read swore that it helped to protect her from getting stretch marks. Well, I guess I am an idiot because NOTHING you do can prevent stretch marks. There is a genetic component to it. I like this stuff, but I wouldn't have spent the money if I didn't think it was a miracle in a bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best product from L'Occitane and the product arrive on time with nice box.

customer_reviews.title: I love the scent of almond and decided to splurge on ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using neutrogena unscented body oil for some time. I love the scent of almond and decided to splurge on this oil. I have just received it and on the plus side, it is not greasy at all. Very quick absorbing and skin feels silky after applying. On the down side the scent is like a hint of almond with floral overtone to me. Much more floral than I expected. If it smelled more like, for example, Amaretto, which is the type of almond scent I expected, then I would have rated it higher. This scent is just not what I expected. For the price I will go back to my Neutrogena for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have used this product for several years and love it. It seems to get used up quickly
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for several years and love it. It seems to get used up quickly, unfortunately, but the smell is divine.

I put it on my pregnant belly daily and I have zero stretch marks and my skin is so soft and smooth! I have also used this on my heels which got incredibly dry during my pregnancy and it worked wonders. A few night putting this on under foot cream and socks fixed my problem!

customer_reviews.text: Great product with not so great packaging. The nozzle is hard to press down which makes using it with slippery hands frustrating. And since it is glass, don't drop it or it will break! I'd probably buy this again but transfer it to a plastic bottle.

customer_reviews.text: This gives your skin a subtle glow while it softens. I wish it wasn't so expensive but it is one of my splurges.

customer_reviews.title: Odor os STRONG!
customer_reviews.text: Smell is incredibly strong, for that reason I can't really use.
customer_reviews.author: 2ndStory

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Love! Love! My skin is so soft and the sudtle almond smell is devine.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Keefe

customer_reviews.title: ... use this on my 64 year old face and love it but combine it with Bliss Body butter
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my 64 year old face and love it but combine it with Bliss Body butter! Really good together or alone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, makes your skin feel silky
customer_reviews.text: I got this to address dry winter skin and it works very well. I love the almond scent!
customer_reviews.author: cheryl blonstein

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Perfectly wonderful to use on my face and scars. Helps heal old scars
customer_reviews.author: Donna Trinsey

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Almond Supple Skin Body Oil, 3.3 Fl Oz
product_meta.description: Formulated with more than 50% almond oil and camelina oil, the Almond Supple Skin Oil melts quickly into the skin to nourish and soften, leaving a satiny-smooth finish. Its subtle scent of fresh almonds is completely irresistible.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
